PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-18512007-12-03,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of STÉFANIE PELLETIER of Montréal, Québec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
